services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Fast solutions to your quality problems with our field engineers based in Europe
services.processSubtitle: The steps we follow to deliver consistent, high-quality results

onSiteRapidResponse.title: On-Site Rapid Response
onSiteRapidResponse.description: 24/7 field support for immediate response to your quality issues
onSiteRapidResponse.intro: When unexpected quality issues hit your production line, every hour matters. With QroneX's On‑Site Rapid Response, our experienced engineers arrive within 24–72 hours and resolve the problem on site.

cost.d: Avoid major losses with early action

i: Define the issue and assess risk

q1.a: We operate across 15 countries in Europe with on‑site teams in all major markets including Germany, France, Italy, Spain and Turkey.

q2.q: How fast can you intervene in emergencies?
q2.a: For critical cases, we can be on site within 6–12 hours. For standard projects, our response time is 24–72 hours.

q3.a: Primarily automotive; extensive experience with Tier1 suppliers, OEMs, e‑mobility, aerospace and heavy vehicles.

sortingContainment.title: Sorting & Containment
sortingContainment.intro: We prevent line stoppages by quickly separating and controlling defective parts, safeguarding your customer's production.

quality.d: Block defects from reaching the customer

q1.q: What inspection methods do you use?
q1.a: Visual, functional and measurement checks according to customer criteria; we provide gauges and fixtures if needed.

q2.a: Yes, we perform agreed minor rework on site (e.g. deburring, cleaning, adjustments) to recover parts.

q3.a: We share daily lot‑based reports with counts, defect codes and photo evidence, plus a final summary.

rework.title: Rework
rework.description: Repairing defective parts to minimize your losses

qualityEngineering.title: Quality Engineering
qualityEngineering.intro: We design and improve scalable quality systems using APQP/PPAP, layered audits and SPC to reduce variation and elevate performance.

q1.q: Can you prepare us for IATF audits?
q1.a: Yes. We align your system with IATF/ISO requirements, including documentation, audits and training.

q2.a: We set up SPC with dashboards and alerts, and train your teams to sustain it.

q3.a: We define KPIs with you and track improvements (scrap, rework, claims, OEE).

technicalRepresentation.title: Technical Representation
technicalRepresentation.intro: We act as your on‑site quality interface with OEMs and Tier1s, steering daily routines, escalation and immediate containment until closure.

interface.d: Single point of contact at customer

q1.q: Do you represent us at customer meetings?
q1.a: Yes, we act as your on‑site interface, joining daily and escalation meetings.

q2.a: We lead immediate actions, sorting/rework and communication until stable.

q3.a: Both. We can support temporary crises or long‑term resident roles.

faq.title: FAQ About Enterprise Solutions
faq.a1: Every enterprise project is unique. We prepare a custom price offer based on your project scope, duration, location and needs. Minimum investment levels apply.
faq.q2: What is the minimum contract duration?
faq.a2: For enterprise projects, the minimum contract duration is 24 months. For large projects, longer-term strategic partnerships are possible.
faq.a3: We operate across Europe. We can deploy on-site teams in Turkey, Germany, France, Italy, Spain and other EU countries.
faq.q4: How soon can a project start?
faq.a4: After contract signing, we can assemble your project team and start operations within 2-4 weeks. For urgent projects, faster starts are possible.

cta.title: Let's Launch Your Enterprise Project
cta.subtitle: We are ready to develop custom solutions for your large-scale quality projects. Let's plan your project with our expert team.

about.heroSubtitle: QroneX is a leading quality consultancy providing fast and accurate on-site solutions to quality problems experienced by Tier 1 suppliers with OEMs, with field-ready engineers based in Europe.
about.visionText: To be the trusted partner for Tier 1 companies on all kind of customer quality services—setting the standard for excellence, driving the quality
about.missionText: We empower Turkey's leading automotive Tier-1 manufacturers with European-quality resident engineering solutions. Our mission is simple: deliver the reliable and fastest service—safely and sustainably.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The core values that shape our work culture and customer relationships at QroneX

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We aim for the highest quality standards in every project and focus on exceeding our customers' expectations.

reliability.title: A Reliable Partner
reliability.description: We provide consistent, timely, and effective solutions to earn our customers' trust.

collaboration.title: Built on Collaboration
collaboration.description: Quality is a team sport. We work shoulder-to-shoulder with devs, ops, and clients to deliver seamless, defect-free experiences.

customerFocus.title: Customer-Focused Quality
customerFocus.description: We engineer quality that customers can feel—from first click to final release.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Building quality solutions that last, with environmental responsibility and long-term value creation.

quickMobility.title: Agility
quickMobility.description: Quick response and agile solutions for fast-moving quality challenges.

leadership.title: Our Leadership Team
leadership.subtitle: Our leaders who carry QroneX to success with years of industry experience

senih.description: Former Valeo Germany PWT Country Quality Director and Valeo Turkey Country Quality Director. Expert in quality excellence with 30 years of experience.
senih.bio: Born in 1965, graduate of Istanbul Technical University Metallurgical Engineering. Held roles as Valeo Germany PWT Country Quality Director, Valeo Turkey Country Quality Director, and Valeo Turkey SQA Manager. With 30 years of experience and expertise in casting and materials. Role model level experience in QRQC, PDCA, FTA, Global 8D and problem-solving tools. Lives in Nuremberg.

aysu.description: 15 years of quality experience at Valeo Group. Expert in customer quality management with Ford, Daimler, Renault (RSA) and Stellantis (STLA).
aysu.bio: Born in 1988, graduate of Bursa Uludağ University Mechanical Engineering. 15 years of quality experience at Valeo Group. 10 years of customer quality management experience with major OEMs such as Ford, Daimler, Renault (RSA) and Stellantis (STLA). Expert in managing production quality teams and project quality management with product development. Lives in Lyon.

zafer.description: Global Industrial Director at Valeo; managed manufacturing operations across 30+ plants in 15+ countries. Established two greenfield manufacturing plants.
zafer.bio: Born in 1975, graduate of Istanbul Yıldız Technical University Mechanical Engineering. Managed operations in 30+ plants across 15+ countries as Global Industrial Director at Valeo. Served as Valeo Turkey Plant Manager. Built two greenfield production plants to full operation. 25 years of experience in key operational and leadership roles. Expert in manufacturing, process engineering, supply chain management, performance management, and operational excellence. Lives in Paris.
